stories.text:
Company I work for is doing a restructuring. 
They say my team is pretty "essential" so we won't be affected. Should I trust that? My gut feel is that I should start looking for a new job and if I get an offer tell my manager and see how he responds.
What do you think?
I work in a devops type role. Been at company for 2 years now.
stories.title: Ask HN: Company is restructuring. Should I look for new job?

stories.text:
What are some real world examples of handling huge workloads and traffic with rather simple infrastructure setups?

Like the much decried “put everything on a single server till you get a million hits a day on your site”
